titles.title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/16/1996--Introduced. Directs the United States Customs Service to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation (refund) of certain entries made at New York, New York, in accordance with the results of an administrative review, during the period from April 1, 1984, through March 31, 1991, by the International Trade Administration of the Department of Commerce (case number A-580-008).
